dublinCore.dc:title: 110 HR 6114 IH: SUNSET Act of 2008
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Doyle (for himself and Mr. Dent) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend the Veterans’ Benefits and Services Act of 1988 relating to testing for infection with the human immunodeficiency virus.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Simplifying and Updating National Standards to Encourage Testing of the Human Immunodeficiency Virus of 2008 or SUNSET Act of 2008.

Section 124 of the Veterans’ Benefits and Services Act of 1988 (38 U.S.C. 4133 note; 102 Stat. 505) and the item relating to such section in the table of contents of such Act (102 Stat. 487) are repealed.
